entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Three Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Three Hills 8:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -10.7°C
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: ENE 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to snow at times heavy and local blowing snow this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
